content: simple and modern the terracotta crop top is the relaxing crochet project you need for summer the entire crop top is worked in one piece with beginner friendly stitches back loop half_double_crochet + slip stitches and only a few row of shaping with a ribbed texture square neck and thick straps you can pair this crop top jeans shorts maxi skirts or over swimsuits this project also works up quickly so you ll be able to make the most of the warm summer days sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
